description: Dive into "Whispers of Love in Hoi An" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Whispers of Love in Hoi An

places.generalDescription: Blue Chic Tailor Hoi An is a charming family-run establishment that has been delighting customers for over 15 years with its exceptional craftsmanship and keen attention to detail. Nestled in the heart of Hoi An, this tailor shop prides itself on using only premium fabrics, offering an extensive range of styles while also accommodating custom designs tailored to individual tastes. Visitors often rave about their experiences, highlighting the swift turnaround time without compromising quality.

sources.snippet: All you have to do is give them your measurements and provide them the design that you want. Just within 24 hours, your product will be ready to pick up. And their strongest expertise is tuxedos & evening gowns.
sources.shortName: 10+ Romantic Things to Do in Hoi An for Couples

sources.snippet: Hoi An is famous across Vietnam for its textile industry and one of the reasons many people come here is to get clothes tailor made for them.
sources.shortName: 25 Best Things To Do In Hoi An (Vietnam)

places.name: Blue Chic Tailor Hoi An

reviews.text: Lye and Thuy made for me 4 excellent pieces of garments. The detail and level of experience is incredible in this establishment. On my first viewing I had decided the shape I had chosen didn't suit me and the lady changed the style in seconds. She is truly an extremely talented individual. They ensured I was happy with everything and shipped my clothes home. Thank you

Hana and Thuy were really amazing. Because of my body proportions I struggeled to find a suit that fits me well. Here I got exactly what I wanted and the clothes just look so so beautiful. I'm glad I could experience this unique moment when watching myself in the mirror with pure joy. They serve you complimentary drinks and the shop is equipped with an AC to make you feel as comfortable as possible. I would definitely recommend this shop to anyone who is looking for very well fitted clothes.

Mimi and Thuy were wonderful in helping us create multiple suits, a tuxedo and a formal ball gown in only 24 hours. This shop is very professional and pays close attention to detail. The price is very fair for the quality and experience in the shop. Thank you!

places.address: 13 Nguy·ªÖn Th√°i H·ªçc, Ph∆∞·ªùng Minh An, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam 560000, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: 45 Thu Tailor in Hoi An is a popular destination for those looking to get tailor-made clothing. The shop offers a wide selection of fabrics and colors, allowing customers to create unique pieces. Visitors praise the attentive service, with staff members like Tam Tam and Kieu providing helpful guidance throughout the process. Customers appreciate the quick turnaround time for fittings and adjustments, as well as the friendly atmosphere at the shop.

sources.shortName: 10+ Romantic Things to Do in Hoi An for Couples

places.name: 45 Thu Tailor| Hoi An Tailor

reviews.text:
I had such a wonderful experience at 45 Thu Tailor in Hoi An! Lily, my sales assistant, was incredibly sweet, friendly, and helpful throughout the entire process. She made everything so easy and enjoyable.

They created the cutest matching dresses for me and my daughter that we absolutely adore, as well as three stunning evening gowns that fit beautifully and feel amazing to wear. The craftsmanship, fabric quality, and attention to detail exceeded my expectations.

Highly recommend this shop if you're looking for custom pieces made with care and style. Thank you, Lily and the team, for making our visit so special!

I'm so incredibly happy. The consultation was fantastic. The woman named Lien is so nice and did everything exactly as I wanted. She discussed my designs with me and selected the fabrics with me. The clothes turned out so beautifully, and they made all the adjustments within an hour. In total, all four items took about 24 hours. I'm thrilled! This is the best tailor shop in Hoi An. If you want clothes, come here.

I had the pleasure of working with Lyn at 45 Tailor, and I couldn't be happier with the dresses she made for me. Her attention to detail, craftsmanship, and ability to bring my vision to life were truly impressive. From the initial consultation to the final fitting, Lyn was kind, patient, and incredibly professional. The quality of the fabric and stitching was excellent, and each dress fit me perfectly.

Lyn has a great eye for design and always made sure I felt comfortable and confident in what I was wearing. I received so many compliments on the dresses, and I know it's all thanks to her skill and care.

If you're looking for a tailor who genuinely cares about her work and her clients, I highly recommend Lyn at 45 Tailor. She's absolutely wonderful!

places.address: 06 Ho√†ng Di·ªáu, St, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam 51000, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Metta Spa & Massage Hoi An, located at 12 Duong Phan Bo Chau, Cam Chau, Ho An, Quang Nam, is a top choice for those seeking a Vietnamese massage or facial. The attention to detail from start to finish sets this spa apart. The friendly therapist ensures your comfort throughout the treatment and the ambiance of the room with pleasant scents and soothing music adds to the overall experience.

sources.shortName: 10+ Romantic Things to Do in Hoi An for Couples

places.name: Metta Spa & Massage Hoi An

reviews.text: Very wonderful massage. Calming, professional and really knowledgeable about the body. I received the bamboo tension massage and I thought the whole time ( or most of the time) would be used with the bamboo. It was more like a nice finishing touch. Which is fine because my massage therapist's hands were magical. Just an FYI the bamboo is similar to a hot stone massage, just a bit at the end. Yummy mango when you finish as well. Overall I was very pleased and would recommend!

I visited based on Google reviews, and my experience was even better than expected.

After walking for a long time, my legs were sore, but the massage saved me. The luxurious atmosphere, cleanliness, friendly owner, and professional massage therapists made this the best massage shop in Vietnam.

Thanks to Metta Spa, I had a wonderful time. Thank you!

Very good massage. I wanted to book a massage for me and my mom for our one day trip to Hoi An. We got the stone massage for 90minutes. We loved the service and the facility is nicely managed.
I recommend this spot if you are looking for a good massage place in Hoi An old town.

places.address: 54 ƒê∆∞·ªùng Phan B·ªôi Ch√¢u, C·∫©m Ch√¢u, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Hoi An Heart Restaurant is highly recommended for its culinary expertise and beautiful presentation. The ambiance is delightful, and the attentive staff aim to please all guests. Despite being a bit niche, the prices are justified by the effort put into each dish. A large bottle of apricot wine, 2 appetizers, 5 main courses, and a shared dessert for 5 people left everyone satisfied without breaking the bank.

sources.siteName: ƒê·∫£o K√Ω ·ª®c H·ªôi An | Hoi An Memories Land | Official Website
sources.shortName: top romantic activities for newlyweds

places.name: Hoi An Heart Restaurant

reviews.text:
I had the pleasure of dining at this restaurant, and everything was simply delicious! I tried three different dishes, and each one was special, with authentic flavors and the freshest ingredients.

Beyond the excellent food, I want to sincerely thank the staff, who were always smiling and welcoming. A special thanks to Thuy, who, with great kindness and professionalism, explained the dishes in detail and recommended the house specialties. Her attentiveness made my experience even more enjoyable!

I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking to try authentic Vietnamese cuisine in a warm and inviting atmosphere. I will definitely be back!

A true gem on the Thu Bon River! This small, warm restaurant is a natural paradise with an incredible view. Every dish was a highlight, from the fresh Salad and crispy Banh Xeo to the tender Bamboo Grill Beef and decadent Ice Cream Banana Rum. The service is as wonderful as the food. A perfect five-star experience from start to finish.

Great food, atmosphere, and service.
I had a enjoyable experience here. The food was flavorful and well-prepared, with a good variety of dishes to choose from. The atmosphere is cozy and inviting-perfect for a relaxed meal. The staff was friendly, welcoming, and quick to serve, which made everything even better.

places.address: 68 ƒê. B·∫°ch ƒê·∫±ng, Ph∆∞·ªùng Minh An, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam 560000, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Coral Spa in Hoi An is a tranquil oasis inspired by the beauty of coral reefs. The spa's decor, with its coral patterns and soothing lighting, creates an underwater ambiance for guests to unwind. Offering a range of beauty services and massages using natural ingredients like coconut and avocado, Coral Spa ensures a rejuvenating experience. Skilled masseuses customize each massage to meet individual preferences, providing relief from travel fatigue.

sources.shortName: 10+ Romantic Things to Do in Hoi An for Couples

places.name: Coral Spa

reviews.text: Deep and pleasant relaxation experience with the combination of 2 formulas with a masseuse with fairy fingers. The massage of the feet and legs, then arms, shoulders and head, although vigorously administered, led to a state of relaxation and well-being and at the same time the feeling of lymphatic circulation resuming throughout the body. Leaving on a cloud, you are then invited to enjoy a homemade yogurt and detox tea. What more could you ask for. The space is clean, quiet and comfortable. A place not to be missed in Hoi An.‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã

Supersedes my expectations and paid price, they are really serious into business. I take their signature package , reasonable price , 9.5/10 (own feeling). Add marks is they will politely checking your feedback whether need to adjust pressure. Before and after massage come with drink and yogurt (usually only in very expensive spa center)

Good service and clean environment. Can speak English. Nice welcoming drink, honey lemon tea and finished snacks, honey yogurt with coconut tea. Around HKD300 for two people, facial and foot message. Good experience!

places.address: 69 Nguy·ªÖn Ph√∫c T·∫ßn, Ph∆∞·ªùng Minh An, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: When the sun sets in Hoi An, the vibrant Hoi An Night Market comes to life, transforming Nguyen Hoang Street into a bustling hub of activity. This enchanting market is a must-visit for anyone exploring the historic town, offering an array of street food delights, unique souvenirs, and stylish clothing. As you wander through this lively atmosphere illuminated by colorful silk lanterns reminiscent of a European Christmas market, you'll find yourself immersed in local culture.

sources.snippet: This is the top place to try Hoi An‚Äôs street food, visiting jewelry or silk stores, as well as getting to know Hoi An‚Äôs culture through the traditional performances like lion dances.
sources.shortName: 10+ Romantic Things to Do in Hoi An for Couples

places.name: H·ªôi An Night Market

reviews.text:
A charming riverside market that comes alive at night with vibrant lanterns, street food, and local crafts. The entire area is beautifully lit, especially around the canal, making it a very photogenic place.

You can find lots of souvenirs, snacks, and drinks like herbal lotus tea. There are cultural houses to visit nearby, including a Japanese-style exhibit. The boat lantern experience was magical and peaceful - definitely a highlight of Hoi An.

The place does get crowded, so be prepared for some walking and queues. Some vendors may not speak much English, but everyone was friendly. Prices vary, so it's good to compare before buying.

‚úÖ Great for evening strolls, photos, and local snacks
üì∏ Tip: Visit at sunset and stay until nightfall for the full experience

A lively and vibrant spot in the heart of the Old Town! The lantern-lit streets are magical at night - perfect for photos. You'll find everything from souvenirs to street food like grilled skewers, coconut ice cream, and Vietnamese pancakes.

It can get crowded, but that's part of the charm. Great place for a casual evening stroll, snack-hunting, and soaking in the festive vibe.

üé® Don't miss the lantern stalls - they make the whole market glow!

I suggest spending at least a full day at this UNESCO World Heritage Site.

The atmosphere changes beautifully from morning to evening, offering a truly unique experience at different times of the day. You'll find many charming cafes around - perfect for relaxing and soaking in the local vibe. ü•≥üòäüëè

However, be prepared to see many similar shops along the streets, which might feel a bit repetitive after a while.

places.address: Nguy·ªÖn Ho√†ng, Ph∆∞·ªùng Minh An, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: When exploring the charming streets of Hoi An, a must-visit destination for custom tailoring is A Dong Silk. This renowned establishment is celebrated for its exquisite silk products and outstanding tailoring services, making it a favorite among travelers in search of luxurious, bespoke garments. A Dong Silk boasts an impressive array of fine silk fabrics and offers a diverse selection of items such as tailored suits, elegant dresses, stylish scarves, and traditional ao dai. Each piece is crafted with meticulous attention to detail.

sources.snippet: Hoi An has several welcoming spas that offer couples treatments, including massages and facials. After exploring the town, a spa day can be the quiet pause you need. Here are some Hoi An spas that you need can consider to try:
sources.shortName: 10+ Romantic Things to Do in Hoi An for Couples

places.name: A Dong Silk

reviews.text:
The whole experience from start to finish with Loan was great.

I had four items tailor made and a custom design. Loan did a really good job at understanding my ask and translating it into a design with the tailor. I had two adjustments made and Loan provided good guidance on fit and design.

I had a silk dress, two pairs of pleated trousers and a silk shirt made. The fabric felt wonderful and they all turned out exactly how I imagined and per reference pictures. The experience did not feel rushed and I thought it was really good value for money.

I feel so lucky to have such beautiful items made for me thank you very much!

We had an absolutely amazing experience at
Two Ladies Tailor! A special shoutout to Hana, our tailor-she was truly the sweetest and most helpful sales associate we've ever met. She made the entire process smooth, fun, and stress-free.
In just two days, they tailored two suits for my boyfriend and created three bottoms and three tops for me, all perfectly fitted and beautifully made. The quality, attention to detail, and level of service exceeded our expectations.
We highly recommend Two Ladies Tailor to anyone visiting H√¥i An. If we're ever back, we'll definitely be returning!

After hearing that this was one of the best tailors in Hoi An, me and my partner went in to have a look at their fabrics and designs. I ended up getting a semi-formal dress and a wrap top. I needed a couple of extra fittings for the dress and we only had 1.5 days to have it correctly fitted. Lee was super helpful in suggesting adjustments and getting it to look just right before we took it home. I really appreciate that they worked so hard and quickly to make sure we left as happy customers, and I'm so happy with the results. Would definitely recommend.

places.address: 62 Tr·∫ßn H∆∞ng ƒê·∫°o, Ph∆∞·ªùng Minh An, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam 563800, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Le Petit Bistro Hoi An is a fantastic dining spot with amazing food and a delightful staff. The chef and the team are highly praised for their culinary skills, while the servers, particularly Diem, are attentive and knowledgeable about local attractions. The atmosphere is relaxed and family-friendly, making it a great place to enjoy a meal. In addition to delicious Italian cuisine, they also offer homemade cheese for sale.

sources.snippet: If you have already fallen in love with Hoi An by its classical and rustic ancient houses, then Thanh Ha Pottery Village is a destination that cannot be missed. Located next to Thu Bon River, Thanh Ha Pottery Village has a unique character of Hoi An,  keeping tourists with its peaceful and rustic beauty that is exclusive to this place.
sources.siteName: ƒê·∫£o K√Ω ·ª®c H·ªôi An | Hoi An Memories Land | Official Website
sources.shortName: top romantic activities for newlyweds

places.name: Le Petit Bistro H·ªôi An

reviews.text:
What an incredible experience! This is our third day in Vietnam, and by far, this restaurant has the best service and food we've had so far. We ordered the escargot, duck leg, steak frites, and ice cream, all of which were incredibly flavorful!

What truly made the experience exceptional was the outstanding service. Our waitress was extremely thoughtful and kind. Noticing that we had walked from the old town, she immediately turned on three fans for us and offered iced water. She even helped take photos of us and made sure we had a great view. Beyond that, she was wonderfully friendly, engaging in conversation and giving excellent recommendations for places to visit. As we were leaving, she even assisted us with our grab ride.

We were beyond impressed and would absolutely return if given the chance!

We found this restaurant on Google maps and with the good reviews we wanted to try it out.

Our experience was really good. Staff were very professional, attentive and kind.

Ambiance was nice with French music being calmly played in the background.

Food was also excellently prepared and nicely served. The meat was medium-rare, ‚Äúthe only way they would allow it‚Äù and I agree, it was really tasty.

Desserts were also nice with the chocolate fondant being the favorite of the evening.

If you are looking for a restaurant that offers French / European style food with high quality, finesse and excellent taste, then this is the place to go.

Excellent food, service and atmosphere! We've been travelling South East Asia for three weeks and while we love the food, we wanted something a little closer to home. The staff were very welcoming and attentive during our meal, they were fabulous. Food was served in good time and tasted excellent. This restaurant offers excellent value for money and I would highly recommend!

places.address: 476 C·ª≠a ƒê·∫°i, C·∫©m Ch√¢u, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam 560000, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: An Bang Beach, located just 3 kilometers east of Hoi An, is a serene escape that beautifully combines natural beauty with local charm. This picturesque beach features soft white sands and crystal-clear turquoise waters, making it an ideal spot for sunbathing or enjoying the gentle waves. The area is lined with charming beach huts and offers a variety of eateries where you can savor fresh seafood and refreshing cocktails while soaking in stunning views of Da Nang Bay and the Marble Mountains.

sources.snippet: Time Out also suggests that when coming to Hoi An, visitors can visit some destinations such as the Hoi An night market, Phuc Kien assembly hall, An Bang beach, Thu Bon riverside bars, or simply sit and enjoy a coffee at Mia Coffee. Vietnamese coffee is a must-try, and Mia Coffee offers everything travelers would expect from a great coffee shop.
sources.shortName: Hoi An is one of the 21 most romantic destinations in the world

sources.snippet: This large-scale outdoor production is a creative retelling of Hoi An‚Äôs history; it‚Äôs a spectacular outdoor production set on an island stage, with over 500 performers. Watching it under the stars on a river island adds a little magic to the experience.
sources.shortName: 10+ Romantic Things to Do in Hoi An for Couples

sources.snippet: For hustle and bustle head to An Bang Beach, the region‚Äôs most popular stretch of sand. Here you can sip fruit cocktails or dine on fresh Vietnamese spring rolls from the many bars and restaurants between sunbathing sessions.
sources.shortName: How to Spend a Romantic Holiday in Hoi An, Vietnam

sources.snippet: This beach is less crowded than many of the more famous strips of sand in the area and you will find pristine white sands that back on to the water.
sources.shortName: 25 Best Things To Do In Hoi An (Vietnam)

places.name: An Bang Beach

reviews.text:
perfect spot for both local and foreign tourists. The water is purely blue and the vibe is feasty on the beach.
There are many food options with reasonable price. Totally safe and worth the money

A great spot to unwind, An Bang Beach offers a clean stretch of sand, plenty of shade under beach huts, and rows of loungers perfect for relaxing. The beachfront is lined with a mix of thatched umbrellas and green canvas canopies, giving it a tropical feel. There's a safety net installed along the swimming area which is a thoughtful touch, especially on busier days. The beach was clean and pleasant to walk along barefoot.

At the top of the beach, you'll find a long line of restaurants and bars. Most of the better spots (and better prices) are on the right-hand side if you're facing the ocean ‚Äì definitely worth walking all the way down to compare. It can get quite crowded during the hotter afternoons, but that only adds to the lively vibe.

Whether you're in the mood for a swim, a sunbathe, or a chilled coconut under a hut, this beach delivers a great afternoon escape.

Very nice and cleaner than I thought from reading reviews.
Very very long walkable beach with sand. Sand can get very hot so make sure to bring footwear.
Otherwise the water is nice and clear and you do not need water shoes.
Not much to snorkel here but if you have goggles there are some different fish to see as well as occasional jellyfish‚Ä¶
The beach chairs and umbrellas are free if you order food and drinks from the restaurants which own those chairs‚Ä¶

places.address: W87R+C7R, ƒê. Hai B√† Tr∆∞ng, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Mezcal Cocteleria in Hoi An is a stylish and sophisticated cocktail bar that offers an upscale drinking experience. The bar specializes in crafting high-quality, creative cocktails, showcasing the art of mixology. The ambiance is in line with the mezcal and Mexican vibe, creating a surprising and authentic atmosphere. Visitors can expect refreshing and smooth signature cocktails like Papa Diablo.

sources.shortName: 10+ Romantic Things to Do in Hoi An for Couples

places.name: Mezcal Cocteleria

reviews.text:
A solid Speak Easy style bar in Hoi An with a relaxing atmosphere, solid drinks and a great feel overall.

I was here with a guide and the snacks along with their adult beverage was excellent. Feels like a great date spot or a spot to get your tequila drinks in.

I'd definitely come back here again in the future.

This deserves every 5 star rating. The margaritas are unbeatable and worth the price. The mocktails are worth a note as well-sweet (but not too sweet), fruity and delicious. The service was very attentive and friendly and the ambience is very romantic. I will recommend this to everyone.

An absolutely superb cocktail bar. Amazing service and a great extensive list of cocktails.

A particular shout out to the staff who made us feel very welcome and speak to us for sometime at the bar.

The bar specialises in Mezcal, but has a full range of cocktails, and the bartenders are very skilled.

Thoroughly recommended

places.address: 38 ƒê. Phan Chu Trinh, Ph∆∞·ªùng Minh An, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam 560000, Vietnam

sources.siteName: ƒê·∫£o K√Ω ·ª®c H·ªôi An | Hoi An Memories Land | Official Website
sources.shortName: top romantic activities for newlyweds

places.name: Hoi An Discover Motorbike Tours

reviews.text: I had an incredible experience on the tour from Hoi An to Hue with my guide, Mr Bi - one of my best experiences in Vietnam so far. He picked me up from my hostel, and we stopped at Marble Mountains and Lang Co beach before driving over the Hai Van Pass. We also stopped at some absolutely beautiful viewpoints. We then had lunch at a seafood restaurant and visited a waterfall and Tam Giang Lagoon on the way to Hue. Mr Bi was an amazing driver, I felt very safe the whole journey. He explained to me about the areas we visited and also took loads of photos for me ‚ò∫Ô∏è Would highly recommend booking a tour through this company and with Mr Bi especially!

We had a great day starting in the hotel in Hoi An, and went to Marble mountain, then we went to dragon bridge, Nam O village, Hai van pass, stopped for lunch at Lang Co, swom at the  Waterfall and saw the fisherman at the Lagoon. After all that they dropped us off at our hotel in Hue.

Mr BI & Quon took very good care of us! They explained a lot about the environment and drove very safe. We had very much fun the whole day and it was great to experience this all on motorbike.

Thanks a lot for this great day!

I just got back from an awesome motorcycle tour in Da Nang and Hoi An, and I have to give a huge shoutout to Vu, our guide. He made the whole experience unforgettable. From the start, he was super friendly and easygoing, and I could tell he really knew his stuff about the area.

The ride itself was amazing! We cruised through the busy streets of Da Nang and then headed out to some quieter, scenic spots. Vu took us to some really cool places-hidden temples, local villages, and some incredible views of the coastline. We even stopped for lunch at this great little spot near the beach.

Vu's riding skills were top-notch, and he made sure we were safe and comfortable the whole time. He even took a few breaks for photos and kept everything at a chill pace. It was the perfect mix of adventure and relaxation.

places.address: 19 Tr·∫ßn Quang Kh·∫£i, C·∫©m Ch√¢u, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Lana Tailor in Hoi An is renowned for its extensive selection of designs and impressive tailoring skills, leaving most customers satisfied. The hospitable staff adds to the overall enjoyable experience. Visitors to Hoi An looking for custom-made clothing should not miss the opportunity to visit Lana Tailor, where they can expect fantastic service, fast turnaround times, and perfectly fitting garments.

sources.shortName: 10+ Romantic Things to Do in Hoi An for Couples

places.name: Lana Tailor

reviews.text:
My friend and I, visiting from the USA, had strongly considered getting a tailored suit made for each of us while visiting Hoi A last year in April 2024. We ended up not - and regretted it! ü•≤

We waited an entire year to make sure we could do it this time! Lana Tailor had many good reviews on Google, plus we liked a coffee and juice shop next door to it. So all roads lead to Lana Tailor!

We casually walked into the shop in the morning around 9:30am and we were greeted so warmly and kindly by Enzie. She was smiling, spoke English clearly [which was important, as we know so little Vietnamese!], and immediately launched into explaining the process, in detail, of having a suit tailor-made. She presented so much information to us, yet never pressured us to make any sale. It made us feel valued as potential customers in the experience, rather than just about a transaction. We told her we would think about it and return if we decided to move forward.

Reflecting on how Enzie was the most thorough in explaining the process and seemed to be so highly skilled in it, we decided we wanted to return and commit to Lana Tailor. Gosh, are we so glad that we did. ü•∞

Beyond the product itself, we felt like we had an entire experience! And every phase was so much fun. The total timeline for two suits - one for a man and one for a woman - was about 32hrs. One Day One, we were working with Enzie and her team by about 11:00. We gave a general idea of the design and color we each desired and she and her staff assisted us in determining the best fabrics, colors, and patterns to fulfill that vision. In moments of being indecisive, there was no pressure ‚Äì only enthusiastic expertise and joyful guidance offered. ‚ÄúIt's important you get what you want - you've come all this way!‚Äù she'd remind us. It was clear that Enzie genuinely cared about us being pleased and having a positive experience. We felt like she really came alongside of us in the process and invested with her heart.

After we selected the fabrics, it was closer to 11:40. Enzie and her staff then took our measurements. Each person maybe required about 15 minutes of her time to capture all of our sizing. She was very focused and detail-oriented to make sure that the suites would fit us perfectly.

We wrapped up with pricing and gave half the amount in cash at that time; we would present the other half when we picked up the completed suites. They did offer to take credit card, but it would require a higher percentage of fee, so we therefore elected to stop at the ATM about one block up from them. Enzie kindly gave us directions. A woman's suit starts around $120/$135, depending on upgrades in fabrics and cosmetic stitching details. It seemed very fair and competitive to other places to which we compared. My friend's men's suit was ten dollars higher in total‚Ä¶.

[continue into photos for full, positive review caption]

****GOOGLE REViEW limited the character count for this review. üôà My full account is in the photos as screenshots pages 1 through 4. üôÇ

I had an extremely positive experience here. I came to Lana with my wife after checking out a few shops in Hoi An.

What brought me here was the staff's friendliness, knowledge of clothes-making and the reasonable price that the shop quotes for different grades of suit/clothings. I would like to thank Enzie for the incredible assistance to my wife and I. We ordered several pieces of clothings (men/women)and had the 1st fitting for all in just four (4) days.  Thereafter, minor adjustments were made and the clothings were ready to be collected within the same day.  The efficiency of this shop is amazing.

Enzie is very friendly, patient and approachable.  She is also very experienced in this trade and her style and tailoring advice were on point. Please come to Lana Tailor whenever you are in Hoi An if you wish to make suits/clothings. Remember to look for Enzie.

Had a wonderful experience here. I ordered 2 suits, a wool coat, a blazer and 6 shirts. I went back many times for fittings and alterations and Huyhn (moon) was so patient with me. Always helpful and gave me her advice. She took me direct to the tailor a couple times so I could explain changes I needed made in short time. I highly recommend her and this place! - Nate

places.address: 90 L√™ L·ª£i, Ph∆∞·ªùng Minh An, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Nestled in the enchanting city of Hoi An, Vietnam, Hoi An Memories Land is a captivating amusement park that opened its doors in 2018. This ancient-style park is renowned for its stunning Golden Bridge, supported by giant hands‚Äîan ideal spot to soak in breathtaking sunset views. As night falls, visitors can immerse themselves in the grand live performance known as 'Hoi An Memories,' which takes place from 8 PM to 9 PM daily (except Tuesdays).

sources.snippet: When mentioning places for a honeymoon, we can not miss Hoi An - a beautiful gem of Vietnam Tourism. This place is honored by CNN as one of 13 most romantic places in the world, the same as Maldives, Venice or Paris.
sources.siteName: ƒê·∫£o K√Ω ·ª®c H·ªôi An | Hoi An Memories Land | Official Website
sources.shortName: top romantic activities for newlyweds

places.name: Hoi An Memories Land

reviews.text:
I have to agree with Reuters in rating this is the most wonderful show in the world. Awesome choreography, combined with world class sound, lighting, laser works and pyrotechnics. The performers work extremely hard for this performance, often starting with the mini shows around the theme park until the grand finale show from 5-9pm.

The show ticket allows you to enter the theme park around 4pm. You may feel underwhelming as you may be the only person there at this time. Good for picture taking at good spots without the crowd. Then at close to 5pm, the crowd starts to trickle in, when the mini shows start and keep you entertained until 7pm, where you have 1hr dinner time at the many restaurants. They are reasonably priced. 8pm is where the grand finale show starts at the main stadium. I'd recommend you buy the Hi-class ticket for the best experience. It's situated right at the middle with good height and distance. VIP seatings may be a little too high up and far to experience the sight and sound, but you get individual chair and table though.

Will definitely return to watch the show again in the future.

This is the most beautiful show I've ever seen in my life. The performance is exquisitely arranged, with stunning props and world-class effects, yet it still preserves the traditional essence in both the story and the music.

Even the mini shows are highly entertaining, with not a single moment that disappoints. I would truly recommend everyone to experience this at least once in their lifetime.

What a beautiful show it is and must do if you're in Hoi An. We bought the high tickets which we thought were perfect. We had a perfect view. Eco looked overwhelming with all the people and no back rest. VIP was not needed either. The whole show was done very professionally and was beautifully told. We didn't eat inside, but they had lots of options.

places.address: C·ªìn H·∫øn, r·∫Ω tr√°i, 200 Nguy·ªÖn Tri Ph∆∞∆°ng, C·∫©m Ch√¢u, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Market Bar - Market Terrace is a hidden gem located in the heart of Hoi An's Old Town. Situated above the bustling streets, this rooftop terrace offers a peaceful escape with stunning views of the historic Old Quarter buildings and lantern-lit streets. Tucked away above a shop near Thu Bon River, it provides an intimate and chic setting for both locals and tourists to enjoy craft beers, cocktails, and delicious food platters.

sources.snippet: For a thoughtful place to stay, consider R√™u Boutique Hotel. It‚Äôs a cozy spot with welcoming rooms, and you‚Äôll have access to their rooftop bar, Fieelld Rooftop Bar, and restaurant, Sowing Restaurant. It‚Äôs a comfortable and quiet spot to return to after a day of exploring Hoi An together.
sources.shortName: 10+ Romantic Things to Do in Hoi An for Couples

places.name: Market Bar - Market Terrace

reviews.text: Loved this place when in Hoi An. Nice cocktails on a second floor rooftop. Perfect place for an evening outdoor drink. We were hungry, so we decided to split the chicken. It was awesome (and the fries were great, too).

The best bar in Hoi An. Literally came here every night of our stay! The gin and tonics are amazing and so affordable. Plus the cocktails are delicious. We indulged in a cheese board for 2 people and came back for it again because it was some of the best cheese I've ever tasted. They do amazing happy hour from 4-6pm every day!

Go for the terrace views, stay for the gin. Great vibe, with stunning views, and a good gin infusion experience. Also got the fish n chips and they lived up to the hype. Especially grateful they serve with ketchup.

places.address: ƒê. B·∫°ch ƒê·∫±ng/02 Ho√†ng Di·ªáu, C·∫©m Ch√¢u, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Mango Rooms in Hoi An, located across from Morning Glory, is a vibrant bistro bar facing the Hoi An Riverside. The restaurant offers a menu of Vietnamese fusion cuisine with an inventive twist by Vietnamese American chef Tran Duc. Dishes like La Cubana and Imperial Mango spring rolls showcase his international culinary experience. The restaurant boasts friendly service, upbeat music, and an impressive selection of signature cocktails and fruity smoothies made with fresh mangoes.

sources.snippet: Mango Rooms is a popular destination for cocktails because of its lively ambience, riverside location, and Latin-inspired menu offerings. Customers love their strong, fruit-forward cocktail menu offerings.
sources.shortName: Seven Romantic Things to Do in Hoi An

places.name: Mango Rooms

reviews.text: I had an exceptional experience with Vietnamese fusion at this place. Honestly, I didn't have high expectations going in, but after my sister raved about it, I decided to give it a shot-and I'm so glad I did. The food was incredibly well-balanced, and the drinks were just as satisfying. The staff were friendly, attentive, and made the whole experience even better. I'd absolutely recommend this spot and will definitely be returning

It's a really nice experience at Mango Rooms. The red snapper fish was perfectly cooked, however, I wish that there were more kumquats in the sauce to balance the richness from the oil. Definitely recommend!

We stopped because we could see the atmospheres from the street. Was early in the day so we had the riverside to ourselves and decided to soak it in. Staff were awesome and we chatted for a bit. Took some pics etc. Amenities were great and the music was funky. Will come back for dinner we think.

Edit: food was incredible. Get the duck!

places.address: 37 ƒê∆∞·ªùng Phan B·ªôi Ch√¢u, C·∫©m Ch√¢u, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Thanh Ha Pottery Village in Hoi An is a historic craft village that has been around for over 400 years. The village features traditional pottery workshops and is known for its signature noodle dish. Visitors can explore the red-roof communal houses, yellow brick walls, dock, and banyan tree that represent a real Vietnamese traditional village.

sources.snippet: If you have already fallen in love with Hoi An by its classical and rustic ancient houses, then Thanh Ha Pottery Village is a destination that cannot be missed. Located next to Thu Bon River, Thanh Ha Pottery Village has a unique character of Hoi An,  keeping tourists with its peaceful and rustic beauty that is exclusive to this place.
sources.siteName: ƒê·∫£o K√Ω ·ª®c H·ªôi An | Hoi An Memories Land | Official Website
sources.shortName: top romantic activities for newlyweds

places.name: Thanh Ha Pottery Village, Hoi An

reviews.text: It was an interesting encounter. You need to pay a small fee to "enter" the village and roam around. Despite not attending any workshop, there are lots of works that are worth looking into, and I recommend it for its price.

70d for two people. You can walk around the village, few houses that most of them make pottery on display. You're free to look and buy. Some owner will let you try how  it's done for free. It was quite interesting. You gave to pay separate for the pottery museum. The shops have a lovely display of pottery, you can haggle too if buying few items.

This is such a cool cultural site to see. I took a pottery class for only a few USD (and now have a handmade souvenir to take home with me) and walked around and saw some really beautiful art. The terracotta pieces around the village and within the museum are huge but filled with intricate details that tell different stories about Vietnam. You pay a small fee to enter the village that helps support its residents and their work, and it also covers a small clay souvenir of your choice. Just a really neat place overall.

places.address: Ph·∫°m Ph√°n, Thanh H√†, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Mia Coffee, located in Hoi An's ancient quarter, has been a favorite among expats and Vietnamese tourists since its opening in 2013. This Australian-style cafe offers a variety of global coffee beans roasted in different locations, ensuring a unique and diverse coffee experience. With free WiFi and a cozy atmosphere surrounded by local shops, Mia Coffee is the perfect place to enjoy a long black coffee or an Americano after exploring traditional Vietnamese coffee options.

sources.snippet: Time Out also suggests that when coming to Hoi An, visitors can visit some destinations such as the Hoi An night market, Phuc Kien assembly hall, An Bang beach, Thu Bon riverside bars, or simply sit and enjoy a coffee at Mia Coffee. Vietnamese coffee is a must-try, and Mia Coffee offers everything travelers would expect from a great coffee shop.
sources.shortName: Hoi An is one of the 21 most romantic destinations in the world

sources.snippet: The coffee varieties on offer here vary according to the season and all the beans here are handpicked to bring you the freshest and tastiest cups of coffee around.
sources.shortName: 25 Best Things To Do In Hoi An (Vietnam)

places.name: Mia Coffee

reviews.text: Best western coffee I've had in Vietnam. They really know how to make a great cappuccino and flat white. I now need to try their egg and salt coffee. Lovely old building too with friendly staff. I highly recommend.

This is one of those places that deserves its high rating!!!!!!

Such a delightfully perfect start to our morning!  Mia Coffee is a gem!!!!   With so many coffee shops in Hoi An, it can get overwhelming but to smell their beans roasting at 5:30 and have the very friendly owner (?) chatting with me before they opened was an easy choice today!

This was the most flavorful coffee I have had in the three weeks we've been in Vietnam ( and that's saying something with all the great coffee here)   As I enjoyed his hot Vietnamese machine coffee, I could smell the banana bread baking.   As it cooled on the table, there's no way one could pass up a slice.   Two slices later and we now can't wait to try their other home baked goodies!  You can feel the pride in the owners? staff‚Ä¶And that's really special yet uncommon !!!!

Thank you for a great morning and we will see you again very soon!!!

On a recent trip to Hoi An (my third in the last six years), I developed the habit of stopping at Mia coffee every morning on my way into town. They're open early, have a lovely veranda, and do a great flat white. The staff were friendly and welcoming as well. It's right on the edge of the Old Town, but it's far enough removed from the center that it's pretty quiet and has a relaxed atmosphere. A great place to sit for a while with a book. There are so many coffee places to choose from in Hoi An, but for me, this is the one.

places.address: 20 ƒê∆∞·ªùng Phan B·ªôi Ch√¢u, C·∫©m Ch√¢u, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: The Shamrock Irish Pub Hoi An is a lively and authentic establishment located in the heart of Hoi An's ancient town. It is known for being the first and only pub in Vietnam to serve Guinness Draught, making it a popular spot for locals and tourists alike. The pub offers a cozy riverside setting, an extensive selection of drinks including beer, cider, stout, and whiskey, as well as live music featuring solo artists.

sources.snippet: For a thoughtful place to stay, consider R√™u Boutique Hotel. It‚Äôs a cozy spot with welcoming rooms, and you‚Äôll have access to their rooftop bar, Fieelld Rooftop Bar, and restaurant, Sowing Restaurant. It‚Äôs a comfortable and quiet spot to return to after a day of exploring Hoi An together.
sources.shortName: 10+ Romantic Things to Do in Hoi An for Couples

places.name: The Shamrock Irish Pub Hoi An

reviews.text:
We have drink here. I drank bee·ªÉ. Can't go wrong with beer. I have to say the band is awesome. Everyone of them. Due to small space the drum is electric but doable the bass and guitar players are awesome. The guitarist really stands out. He is great, the tone of his guitar is clean.

Both singers are really good, the female is very nice looking and has good presentation on the stage.

The male singer. I have to give him the best credit because he pulled of a very difficult song from AC/DC Thunder Struck. I don't think even native Australia could pull this off. He is awesome . Every note, screaming he did it well . The whole audience scream and laughing at the same time because he is that good. The guy has a voice. I'll definitely be back. I was really enjoyed H·ªôi An because of this band. Good luck guys. All the best

Great Bar in the Heart of Hoi An Old Town!
This bar is in the center of Hoi An Old Town. If you're taking a Grab, you'll only need to walk about 3‚Äì5 minutes from the drop-off point-super convenient and easy to find.

There's live music every evening from 6 PM to 11 PM, creating a vibrant and relaxing vibe. The bar also has a pool table, which is a nice touch if you're looking for something fun to do while enjoying your drink.

It opens from 9:00 AM to 1:30 AM, so whether you want a daytime coffee or a late-night cocktail, this spot has you covered. The staff and owner are genuinely friendly and welcoming-it feels more like visiting a friend's place than a typical bar.
Definitely worth a visit if you're exploring the Old Town!

Seeing the same faces I've seen in August 2024 during my visit in Hoi An made me really enthusiastic that I've chosen to take seat here. In contrast to the neighbouring bar, Wanderlust Hoi An, where staff members have a bad attitude, the staff of Shamrock reacts much better.
I want to thank Andy for the short chats I've had with him. More staff members should be like Andy, so thanks to him. I also saw an older man walking around with the tray. Hope he's doing well and much respect for him doing the job at such an age.

places.address: 15 Nguy·ªÖn Ph√∫c Chu, Ph∆∞·ªùng Minh An, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam 560000, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Located in Hoi An Ancient Town, 92 Station Restaurant & Cafe offers a blend of Vietnamese and international cuisine in a modern dining atmosphere. The restaurant is known for its attentive service and authentic dishes like cao lau noodles, com ga (chicken rice), and the Hoi An Tasting Menu featuring regional specialties. While prices may be slightly higher than other local eateries, all proceeds support hospitality and culinary training programs for underprivileged youths in the area.

sources.snippet: 92 Station Restaurant and Cafe is a hidden gem for cocktails. Their delicious drinks are made with herbs from an organic farm and their cocktails are attractively presented.
sources.shortName: Seven Romantic Things to Do in Hoi An

places.name: 92 station restaurant & cafe

reviews.text:
A rather touristy place as everyone wants to get the view at the roof. That being said, I personally think it's worth doing as you get to see a very new perspective of hoi an.

I took a seat at the second floor and it was very relaxing overlooking the busy street.

The coffee is, indeed, pricier than other places but it's required to get access upstairs.

Beautiful view, really comfy. We had really good time while at the cafe. Coffee is really great, shame it's in plastic cups. Would really prefer to drink it from a mug, and less trash would be produce. But overall, a great experience

92 Station is a great alternative to the often-crowded Faifo Coffee. Drink prices are reasonable, with decent quality and attentive service. The view is quite lovely, especially during sunset, making it a peaceful spot to unwind away from the crowds.

places.address: 92 Tr·∫ßn Ph√∫, Ph∆∞·ªùng Minh An, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam 564007, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Mai Fish Restaurant in Hoi An, Vietnam is a charming bistro with a picturesque riverside setting and a cute beer garden. It's known for serving Pasteur Street Brewing Co. ales, making it an ideal spot to relax with craft beer. Run by the renowned Chef Duc, who has a global culinary background, Mai Fish offers traditional Vietnamese dishes at reasonable prices. The restaurant is especially popular for its banh mi and Cao Lau.

sources.shortName: The best Restaurants in Hoi An, Vietnam 2025

places.name: Mai Fish Restaurant

reviews.text:
I was brought here by a tour guide and it was an excellent spot for a drink with snack.

A solid beverage that was tasty and the snack was delicious. The interior was excellent and had a homely feel.

I'd definitely come back here again to try their other menu items.

Came across this restaurant from Trip advisor. When we reached the hotel from the road into Hoi An market, we were not too impressed. However the staff told us that there was a river facing seat.

Staff were attentive and we ordered the seafood salad, rice rolls and jasmine rice with chicken, together with the Mai cocktail and Pina colada.

Food was very delicious- all 3 items. The seafood salad had a refreshing sauce. The jasmine rice was flavourful together with the sauce. The only letdown was that the rice roll sheet was too thick.

Overall it was a great evening. We spent about 980kVND for all the food. Pleasant and will recommend.

You can absolutely trust this place with the taste. It won't disappoint. The cocktails are interesting too ! The service , staff, vibe, everything is beautiful. Try the dessert with the banana. I found it on Google Maps and took my chances ! But it turned out to be one of the best restaurants, so i went there twice in a row!

places.address: 45 Nguy·ªÖn Th·ªã Minh Khai, Ph∆∞·ªùng Minh An, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Shore Club, An Bang Beach is a vibrant and lively night club located on the popular An Bang Beach in Hoi An. The spacious dance floor offers stunning views of the coastline while local and international DJs spin techno and electronic music. With its colorful furnishings representing different beach features, this hidden gem is a lovely place to enjoy food and the beautiful beach. The venue also accepts card payments and is popular among western visitors.

sources.shortName: 10+ Romantic Things to Do in Hoi An for Couples

places.name: Shore Club, An Bang Beach

reviews.text:
Shore Club is one of the most beautiful and classy lounges on An Bang Beach.
The food is diverse, and the drinks are just as impressive. On a hot sunny day, enjoying a cold draft San Miguel by the beach is simply perfect.

Since I live in Hoi An, I only come here once or twice a year, but every time has been a great experience. Wishing the team continued success and hope you keep up the excellent standards!

We loved spending time at The Shore, great setting and lovely food. When Pam is working the service we had was absolutely amazing, but sadly this wasn't so good when her shift ended. Maybe she is just such a super star that no one can match her! Great time there with our teenagers, and everything we ate and drank was delicious. Atmosphere most of the time was brilliant. We booked daybeds overlooking the beach with the pool behind us which was amazing. Atmosphere varies depending on the guests that day, but that's out of the venues control.
Chilled out here on the beach chairs. Towels were 25k. Cocktails were a bit pricey but really really good so it was worth it. Upstairs day beds look chill and the music is good. Didn't try the food

places.address: An Bang Beach, Road, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: MANGO MANGO is a popular river-side restaurant located in a bustling shopping district, offering a modern twist on traditional Vietnamese flavors. The restaurant is known for its highly recommended duck breast and papaya salad, as well as its spicy and fruity tiger prawns. Situated across the riverbank from the Japanese Bridge, it provides a stunning view of the Thu Bon River and the bustling night market.

sources.shortName: The best Restaurants in Hoi An, Vietnam 2025

sources.snippet: Situated on the banks of the poetic Hoai River, Mango Mango boasts one of the most beautiful views in Hoi An. With its open space, the restaurant offers a stunning vista of the river and the lantern-lit ancient town. Mango Mango‚Äôs menu is diverse, ranging from Vietnamese to international dishes, catering to all tastes.
sources.shortName: Where to Impress Your Date

places.name: MANGO MANGO

reviews.text:
You must make a reservation to get a good seat with a cool breeze and a nice view!!
The food, especially mood in love, was stunning. You must order a white rice for it or change the basic fried noodles with rice. Both works!
If you put half of fish on a spoon,
same size of rice, mango salsa, pickle, wasabi, ginger, and soy sauce soaked sea grape,
BAAAAM! You can feel the Japanese luxury sushi restaurant in your mouth ! I strongly recommend this method!!

Must try!!

Excellent restaurant in the heart of old town Hoi An. Cocktails are excellent and great value during happy hour. Food is Asian fusion and very tasty. Service can be a little hit and miss but I'll definitely be back. Location is exceptional for views of the river and people watching.

Mango Mango is a great spot right in the heart of Hoi An Old Town, and it ticks all the right boxes. Best spot would be the balcony or upstairs which offers great view overseeing the sunset in the old town.

The food was excellent ‚Äì the pork chop was particularly memorable, thick yet incredibly juicy. They also offer a wide variety of cocktails, including some unique Mango Mango house specials, which are definitely worth trying.

One of the best parts is the overall vibe ‚Äì you get to enjoy good food and drinks, take in the view, and even listen to live music from the venue next door. The staff were attentive and friendly, adding to the overall great experience.

Yes, prices are slightly on the higher side, but for the quality, service, and atmosphere, it's well worth it.

places.address: 45 Nguy·ªÖn Ph√∫c Chu, Ph∆∞·ªùng Minh An, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: The Field Restaurant & Bar offers a serene countryside ambiance with picturesque views of rice paddies and a nearby river. Guests can engage in folk games or fishing activities with the restaurant's staff, making for a unique experience. The setting is enhanced by colorful lanterns and lush greenery, providing a peaceful atmosphere for families to enjoy. Additionally, the establishment is known for its excellent service and delectable cuisine, making it an ideal destination for those seeking both relaxation and gastronomic delight.

sources.snippet: is the perfect destination for those seeking a refined and elegant dining experience. With its open design, the restaurant offers an airy space, blending seamlessly with nature, creating a sense of relaxation and comfort. The Field Restaurant‚Äôs menu is a harmonious fusion of traditional Vietnamese cuisine and modern Western style, presenting unique and enticing dishes.
sources.shortName: Where to Impress Your Date

places.name: The Field Restaurant & Bar

reviews.text: Beautiful setting in the rice fields, ideal for any special occasion. Our waitress was very friendly and delivered great customer service. She even provided mosquito spray in case we needed it. Great selection of local, sustainable ingredients (lots of vegetarian options too!). We chose the local fish options which was delicious!

We loved the service from Hiep for my 40th birthday celebration. They went next level with the dining and table service plus a beautiful cake to celebrate. The sunset cocktails were amazing and the food was so special. Would recommend to everyone with a big group or small for bespoke dining experience.
Amazing! Quality price is really worth it. So fresh, so much taste in the food and different than what they serve in other restaurants.

places.address: Vong Nhi hamlet, T·ªëng VƒÉn S∆∞∆°ng, C·∫©m Thanh, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Morning Glory Signature is a highly regarded and sophisticated restaurant in Hoi An, offering a contemporary twist on traditional Vietnamese dishes. The upscale venue, overseen by renowned local restaurateur Ms Vy, presents beloved family recipes with a modern flair. Diners can savor saut√©ed squid with steamed black rice and lemongrass stalks wrapped with minced meat while enjoying picturesque views of the Japanese Bridge from the balcony.

sources.snippet: Morning Glory is another beloved restaurant in Hoi An, popular among many visitors. The restaurant provides a warm and friendly atmosphere, along with a rich menu of local specialties. At Morning Glory, you‚Äôll have the opportunity to savor traditional Hoi An dishes like Cao Lau, Mi Quang, and Banh Bao Banh Vac, prepared according to family recipes, guaranteeing a rich and unforgettable taste.
sources.shortName: Where to Impress Your Date
The best Restaurants in Hoi An, Vietnam 2025
Seven Romantic Things to Do in Hoi An

places.name: Morning Glory Signature

reviews.text: Dined here as a walk-in and was able to get a table out back. I ordered the seafood spring rolls as an entree and the sea bass as my main. Both were really delicious and the portion sizes were much bigger than I was expecting - I struggled to eat it all. Was pleased with my overall dining experience here.

A Flavorful Experience at Morning Glory Signature. Morning Glory Signature is a truly impressive restaurant in the heart of Hoi An. Housed in a large, beautifully styled building, it offers a unique ambiance with its cozy, old-market-inspired interiors. The space is vast, with different rooms and sections, yet it manages to feel warm and inviting despite how busy it can get.

The service is excellent - well-organized and attentive, even at peak hours. As for the food, everything we tried was flavorful and well-executed. A special highlight was the sizzling beef with black pepper - bold, aromatic, and deliciously peppery. Some of the other dishes also leaned towards strong, punchy flavors, which we personally enjoyed.

Overall, a great dining experience with rich tastes and a vibrant setting. Definitely worth a visit when in Hoi An.

The food is generally packed with bold flavors, though many dishes leaned heavily on the salty side. If you enjoy strong, savoury tastes, you'll likely appreciate their offerings more. Highlights include the fried turmeric noodles and baby calamari - both well-executed and flavorful. However, the grilled scallops were a miss for us; they were overwhelmingly salty, masking the natural taste of the scallop.
Desserts offered a pleasant surprise with a wide selection that wasn't overly sweet - a nice balance to the savory dishes. Their signature cocktails are also worth trying: reasonably priced, well-mixed, and notably not watered down. You can really taste the alcohol distinctly. Lastly, great river view if you sit at higher floors. Definitely a good bonus!

places.address: 41 Nguy·ªÖn Ph√∫c Chu, An H·ªôi, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam 560000, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Cua Dai Beach, located just 4 kilometers east of Hoi An Ancient Town, is a picturesque destination known for its long stretch of fine white sand and clear waters. This beach has been recognized as one of the most beautiful in Asia by TripAdvisor. Visitors can enjoy sunbathing, swimming, or taking a leisurely bike ride along the romantic coastline. With rows of palm trees and thatched umbrellas providing shade, it's an ideal spot for relaxation.

sources.shortName: 10+ Romantic Things to Do in Hoi An for Couples

places.name: Cua Dai Beach

reviews.text: We took a Grab Taxi from An Bang Beach, where we spent 4 hours. This beach was much less crowded on 10th Nov '24, with only a couple of tourists. The sea water appeared cleaner and greener here, but food options were limited. For those seeking a private experience, this is an excellent beach. However, if you prefer a crowd during the off-season, An Bang Beach is ideal. Remember to carry your own drinking water.

Ride out past paddy fields and to the beach. Soak in the waves and relax and go get a coffee and some food. Nice way to spend a Sunday. Sad to see the flood barriers which can change the look of photos but obviously necessary after recent history.

Really peaceful, and quiet beach. There are few people and the beach is beautiful.. white sandy beaches much better than those at A Bang Beach.   Lounges and umbrellas are available along the beaches at a fee. I paid about VND 50k to use a lounger which is highly recommended if you do not want to be roasted by the scorching sun. Toilets are available for shower.

In my opinion, can just skip An Bang beach and come here instead if you want to avoid the crowds.

places.address: C·∫©m An, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam, Vietnam

sources.snippet: The presence of Wakaku, a fine dining Japanese restaurant, is a welcome deviation from the expected Vietnamese and Western fare for both visitors and locals alike. If you find yourself craving quality sushi, Wakaku in Hoi An is the perfect place for your romantic meal out. After all, both Wakaku‚Äôs name and concept are rooted in Hoi An‚Äôs oldest known love story.
sources.shortName: Seven Romantic Things to Do in Hoi An

places.name: Wakaku Restaurant

reviews.text: Fresh sashimi, delicious food, and excellent service-this restaurant is a solid choice. We noticed that the taste of the teriyaki unagi sauce was slightly different from what we're used to, but it was still flavorful and delicious. The presentation of the dishes is impressive, from the thoughtful little sauce holders to the overall restaurant setup. Every detail counts, and it all comes together to make this a fantastic dining experience.

So great Japanese restaurant in Hotel Royal Hoi An Gallery. We visited it because stayed in hotel and happy to choose this place for a dinner. Although we are not big fans of Japanese food, but dishes and drinks here were so delicious!

We tried Kaiso salad, Umibudo salad, Edamame, Misoshiru soup, Unadon, Sesame Ice Cream, Special Japanese ice cream YUZU lime, passion fruit and watermelon fresh juices and Oolong Ginseng. These food and drinks were enough for 2 ladies :) Sesame ice cream was so great so we ordered it 2 more times :)) I'm happy I tried Chargrilled Japanese eel for the first time here because if it's not enough grilled, it can be dangerous for your health. But here I was calm about the quality and taste.

Decorations and details were beautiful.

Thank you so much Nhi, Nhan, Mui, Nhung for our amazing dinner! Food, drinks and service were just amazing.

Really rather excellent japanese/sushi restaurant in Hoi An. I've tried a few different ones in Hoi An and this is easily the best, also pretty affordable. Excellent and quick service. Ate here two nights in a row.

places.address: 39 ƒê√†o Duy T·ª´, Ph∆∞·ªùng C·∫©m Ph·ªï, H·ªôi An, Qu·∫£ng Nam 560000, Vietnam
